Class SnakeGame

Game.SnakeGame
public class SnakeGame extends Object

      public SnakeGame(ScoreUpdater updater, Repainter repainter, int gridWidth, int gridHeight)
      Constructs a SnakeGame object.
      Parameters:
      updater - The score updater for the game.
      repainter - The repainter for updating the game screen.
      gridWidth - The width of the game grid.
      gridHeight - The height of the game grid.

    • checkCollisions

      private boolean checkCollisions(Snake snake, boolean isPlayer)
      Checks collisions between a snake and other entities.
      Parameters:
      snake - The snake to check collisions for.
      isPlayer - Indicates if the snake is the player's snake.
      Returns:
      True if a collision occurred, false otherwise.
